:py:mod:`pyslam.demos.monocular_capture`
========================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.demos.monocular_capture

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains a demo that captures frames from
   a monocular file camera
   on the machine, and displays with PyGame



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyslam.demos.monocular_capture.run



.. py:function:: run() -> None

   Runs the monocular capture demo.
